title: Age Counter
descr: Users input their birthdate, and the app calculates and displays their current age in years, months, days, hours, minutes, birthday countdown etc

title: Carpathian Herbs Shop
descr: Mock e-commerce store designed for portfolio purposes with essential features like category sorting, popular products, and a shopping cart. Users can switch between light and dark themes.

title: Todo List
descr: A minimalist To-Do List app with smooth animations. Features include task completion tracking, sorting options for completed and pending items

title: Honey Shop
descr: Small e-commerce web application with smooth animations. It demonstrates essential features commonly found in online stores.

title: Compremont
descr: Computer and smartphone repair workshop website.  The site features an engaging carousel slider that showcases key offerings, and subtle element animations enhance user interaction.

title: Food spin
descr: Website layout design based on a free template. Spinner carousel, dynamic animations, responsive design
